original_text: Your soldiers may be living in tents while they fight against your enemies. They must keep away from anything that makes them unclean.
korean_text: 네가 적군을 치러 출진할 때에 모든 악한 일을 스스로 삼갈지니

sentences.original_text: Your soldiers may be living in tents
sentences.korean_translation: 네 병사들은 천막에 거주할 수 있으며

sentences.original_text: while they fight against your enemies
They must keep away from anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모든 것으로부터 멀리 떨어져 있어야 하며
